kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/game path_url=/game headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
